channel.title: Mistex - Economy, Bank Tabs, Unique Content & Much More!
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Trebuchet MS] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qHLcCpf.png[/img]
[URL=http://mistex.org/forum/index.php?/portal/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/L7cA6VK.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://mistex.org/forum/index.php?/page/playnow.html][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G62Ie0M.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://mistex.org/forum/index.php?/hiscores][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yDbDpu4.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://mistex.org/forum/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AeisAiO.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://mistex.org/donate/donate.php][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mOifMID.png[/img][/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NQ2p2S5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vWsFPx2.png[/img]
Mistex is a server that is inspired and driven by you, the members of Mistex. We listen to what the players want, we want everyone to feel like Mistex is a server where they truly belong. The game play is not only fresh it is extremely fluid and highly customizable. We carefully selected the best features of each different revision and put them all into one perfect server. The content of Mistex is outstanding, there are features that no other servers can replicate. Mistex has an outstanding set of developers that are not only professional and educated but dedicated. The features of Mistex are endless, however these are a few 'key' features:
[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vcLMWo1.png[/img]
* Amazing Combat (Correct data, formula, configurations) * Perfect item switching * Bank tabs w/ searching * All skills work perfectly * Skill orbs * Skill goals * Amazing economy setup * Stable, no lag with 99.9% uptime * Beautiful Fullscreen/Resizeable/Fixed Game Modes * Amazing Achievement System (Progress,Interfaces,Tab) * Unique Player Profiler System * Togglable gameplay * Breathtaking Client * Fun Statue Minigame * Loyalty Titles * Tweening * TriviaBot * Fast loading * Small cache size * Forum Highscores * Highscores (Shows top 50 Pkers) * XP Counter * 562 Gameframe * All Specials work flawlessly! * Kill streak System * Dicing! * Loads more!
What are you waiting for? Join now and begin your adventure!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0qeTp53.png[/img]

item.title: Mistex - Economy, Bank Tabs, Unique Content & Much More!
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

This server is amazing.
This week, the developers will be doing many big updates and bug fixes. There will then be
the release of a new client. After the new client is released, Mistex CEO Play Boy will be buying advertisements
on (I assume multiple) sites, so you’ll probably want to join the server now to get a head start.
Here’s a piece of a post made yesterday by Play Boy:

You can expect all of these updates by friday. Come play now!

Read full topic

item.title: Mistex - Economy, Bank Tabs, Unique Content & Much More!
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

[CENTER][FONT=Trebuchet MS]

[URL=http://mistex.org/forum/index.php?/portal/][/URL][URL=http://mistex.org/forum/index.php?/page/playnow.html][/URL][URL=http://mistex.org/forum/index.php?/hiscores][/URL][URL=http://mistex.org/forum/][/URL][URL=http://mistex.org/donate/donate.php][/URL]

Mistex is a server that is inspired and driven by you, the members of Mistex. We listen to what the players want, we want everyone to feel like Mistex is a server where they truly belong. The game play is not only fresh it is extremely fluid and highly customizable. We carefully selected the best features of each different revision and put them all into one perfect server. The content of Mistex is outstanding, there are features that no other servers can replicate. Mistex has an outstanding set of developers that are not only professional and educated but dedicated. The features of Mistex are endless, however these are a few ‘key’ features:

[/CENTER]

  • Amazing Combat (Correct data, formula, configurations)
  • Perfect item switching
  • Bank tabs w/ searching
  • All skills work perfectly
  • Skill orbs
  • Skill goals
  • Amazing economy setup
  • Stable, no lag with 99.9% uptime
  • Beautiful Fullscreen/Resizeable/Fixed Game Modes
  • Amazing Achievement System (Progress,Interfaces,Tab)
  • Unique Player Profiler System
  • Togglable gameplay
  • Breathtaking Client
  • Fun Statue Minigame
  • Loyalty Titles
  • Tweening
  • TriviaBot
  • Fast loading
  • Small cache size
  • Forum Highscores
  • Highscores (Shows top 50 Pkers)
  • XP Counter
  • 562 Gameframe
  • All Specials work flawlessly!
  • Kill streak System
  • Dicing!
  • Loads more!

What are you waiting for? Join now and begin your adventure!

[/FONT]

Read full topic
